content: the weekend bucket hat is a quick and easy crochet bucket hat pattern that creates the perfect summer accessory the entire hat is worked in the round in one piece which means no seaming is required get started today on this fun beginner friendly pattern that will build your confidence in your crochet abilities **materials ** to make one hat you will need the following materials -1 75 skeins 215 yards knit picks cotlin dk weight yarn in silver -us 03 3 25 mm crochet hook -1 removable stitch marker -scissors -tapestry/yarn needle for weaving in ends ﻿**size & fit ** ﻿adult women s medium head circumference 21-23 inches ﻿**skill level ** ﻿beginner
